abstract: Philip Gibbs, Jupiter Financial’s high-profile investor in financial stocks, has put more than half his fund into cash as uncertainty around the U.K. election and western governments’ debt hamper visibility, Reuters reported.
snippet: Philip Gibbs, Jupiter Financial’s high-profile investor in financial stocks, has put more than half his fund into cash as uncertainty around the U.K. election and western governments’ debt hamper visibility, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Philip Gibbs, Jupiter Financial‘s high-profile investor in financial stocks, has put more than half his fund into cash as uncertainty around the U.K. election and western governments debt hamper visibility, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Jupiter Star Puts Half His Fund In Cash
